Text: JamesKees, how can I reach you?  I have some questions about an old Kung Fu movie I want to find.

Anyone else than me who can't get subs? I suspect that there are no subs unless they're inbedded/hardcoded and I can not find any indication for it.

James, your efforts in the kung-fu movie world are very much appreciated. Thank you.
I would like to know, is this a DVD rip, campot, or a TS ? Is this cantonese or mandarin? Hows the video and audio quality too? Does this have surround sound?
Has anyone got the subtitles to sync? I've found various subs but can't get any to stay in sync.
Stuck at 74.75%. Would someone please seed this movie. Thanks!
